Body:
"""
        Test that a ClientConnectionNotOpen exception is raised when trying
        to check an object on an unopened client connection.
        """
client = ProxyKmipClient()
kwargs = {'uid': '1', 'usage_limits_count': 100, 'cryptographic_usage_mask':
    [enums.CryptographicUsageMask.ENCRYPT, enums.CryptographicUsageMask.
    DECRYPT], 'lease_time': 10000}
self.assertRaises(ClientConnectionNotOpen, client.check, **kwargs)
mock.patch('kmip.pie.client.KMIPProxy', mock.MagicMock(spec_set=KMIPProxy))
